metadata.name: cn
metadata.description: A utility function that combines multiple class names or class value expressions using clsx and tailwind-merge. It helps in merging Tailwind CSS classes efficiently while handling conflicts and duplicates.

inputs.description: An array of class values that can include strings, objects, arrays, or other valid class name expressions

returns.description: A merged string of class names with conflicts resolved using tailwind-merge

metadata.remarks: This function is particularly useful when working with Tailwind CSS in React components where you need to combine multiple class names conditionally while ensuring proper precedence and conflict resolution.
